publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-954 Mr Jack McConnell: The Docks and Harbours (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Local Government Committee in consideration of The Docks and Harbours (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000 recommends that the Order be approved.
